Name: external_id
Description: User ID for Braze profile merge

Name: logPurchase (per line item)
Description: One event per cart line at order
Properties / Fields: product_id; price (line total); currency (USD); quantity; product_name; product_category; customizations; order_id; store_id; store_name

Name: add_to_cart
Properties / Fields: product_id; product_name; product_category; base_price; quantity; customizations; customization_total; total_price

Name: order_completed
Properties / Fields: order_id; subtotal; tax; total; items_count; unique_items; store_id; store_name; pickup_time; reward_redeemed; reward_discount; coupon_discount; points_earned; payment_method

Name: notification_preference_changed
Notes: Review - also map to Braze subscription groups

Name: LTO coupon redeemed
When Triggered: Tap Order Now on Double Smash Deal; apply at checkout
